title: The Loneliest thing in the Universe - SCP-7409
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]

”[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7409 The object] is located approximately 700 million light years from Earth. This location is notable for being at the approximate center of the Boötes Void.”

[[image https://i.imgur.com/zDMbJ3G.png]]
